name: Real-Time Chat App
desc: A full-stack chat application built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO for real-time, bi-directional communication between users.

name: Personal Portfolio
desc: My personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experience. Built with HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript.

name: Video Call App
desc: A web-based video calling application demonstrating WebRTC functionalities for peer-to-peer connections.

name: Spotify Clone
desc: A clone of the Spotify web player user interface, focusing on recreating the front-end experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Movie Recommendation System
desc: A recommendation engine built using Python and Machine Learning to suggest movies to users based on their viewing history and preferences.
